Name: Retro three kingdoms : Special edition
About the game: ▶ Please choose 24 heroes and enjoy the game. ▶ This game is a low-spec 2d MMORPG, and there is a MOBA system in which the four forces of Wei(魏), Shu(蜀), Wu(吳), and Han(漢) fight in the game every hour. (All players can start with the same condition at the same level.) ▶ Divide into three factions and participate in the Red Cliff War. You can get BUFF, which increases the attack speed of your character. ▶ Join the forces of Cao Cao and Yuan shao and participate in the Guandu Wars. You can earn war-points. ▶ You can make a 「sworn brother」. When you have an emergency, you can immediately call in your 「sworn brother」. Escape the crisis with him. ▶ Depending on the weather, each area will be changed to a PK area, but a greater reward awaits you. Depending on the wind direction, each faction can acquire additional BUFF. ▶ Participate in the Siege of Chang'An. You can earn 6 million RTK points. ▶ Participate in rivalry of local barons. You can fight for a total prize money of 3 million RTK points.
